name: Bubble Pain
description:
It is a runner with procedural obstacles.

It is recommended to play on android.

The goal of the game will be to survive as long as possible to maybe at the end become a bubble.

You will be able to control the speed of the character thanks to a gauge in the upper right corner.

This game was developed in 1 week and by one person(dev, graphics and sound design).

It was made to understand better defold(1 month of use).

Good game !!!!!!
